pullRequest.title: issue #1007 minor enhancement to resourceTypesCache
pullRequest.bodyText:
The small enhancement is to query ResourceTypesCache first, if no found, then query the local MAP, this will help to avoid at least (batch size -1) query to the database.
Signed-off-by: Albert Wang xuwang@us.ibm.com
